name: Nest Ball
conditions: Dependent on Pokémon's level: ((41 - Pokémon's level) ÷ 10)x if Pokémon's is below level 30.

name: Net Ball
conditions: Pokémon is either Bug or Water type.

name: Dive Ball
conditions: Used while surfing, fishing, or diving.

name: Luxury Ball
effect: Doubles caught Pokémon's friendship increase rate.

name: Quick Ball
conditions: Used on the first turn of battle.

name: Heal Ball
effect: Fully restores a caught Pokémon's HP, PP, and status ailments.

name: Dusk Ball
conditions: Used at night or in a cave.

name: Repeat Ball
conditions: Pokémon is already in the player's Pokedex.

name: Timer Ball
conditions: Dependent on number of turns passed in battle: (1 + number of turns * 1229/4096)x with a max of 4x

name: Moon Ball
conditions: Pokémon species can evolve using a moon stone.

name: Love Ball
conditions: Opposing Pokémon is of the same species and of the opposite gender as your own.

name: Level Ball
conditions: Dependent on level difference between opposing Pokémon and yours: 1-Same Level, 2-Higher, 4-Double, 8-Quadruple, respectively.

name: Fast Ball
conditions: Pokémon's base speed is greater than or equal to 100.

name: Sport Ball
conditions: Used only in the Bug-Catching Contest in the National Park.

name: Cherish Ball
conditions: Unobtainable Poké-Ball, used only for exclusive event Pokémon.
